interestingFact: Japan has more than 5 million vending machines, many selling unusual items like eggs or ramen.
Brazil is home to about 60% of the Amazon Rainforest.
India is the world’s largest democracy by population.
Iceland has no mosquitoes, despite its many lakes and wetlands.
Canada has the longest coastline of any country in the world.
Australia is home to more kangaroos than people.
Ancient Egyptians invented the 365-day calendar based on the sun.
South Korea has the fastest average internet speed in the world.
Norway was the first country to ban deforestation.
Chile is home to the Atacama Desert, one of the driest places on Earth.
